pageContext.claim: “And our country would have saved a trillion dollars and we would have had great healthcare.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's claim of $1 trillion in savings is wrong. The Senate bill to repeal and replace Obamacare -- which Trump faulted Sen. John McCain (R-Ariz.) for blocking -- would have reduced the deficit by a net $321 billion over 10 years, according to a joint analysis by the Congressional Budget Office and the Joint Committee on Taxation."
